analysis.purpose: Initializes the database module for CodeInventory
analysis.description: The __init__.py file in the database directory of CodeInventory is responsible for initializing the database connection and defining the necessary functions to interact with it.
usage_examples: The code in this file is imported by other files that need to interact with the database.
analysis.architectural_role: Provides a foundation for data storage and retrieval
analysis.performance_notes: Initializes the database connection only once, so it has minimal performance impact.
